problem.p: Part 4. (Same question as part 3) Now suppose there is friction between \(M_{1}\) and the inclined plane. The system is held at rest and then released. Which of the following statements are true?

li.p: For block \(M_{1}\), the change in its kinetic energy is equal and opposite to the change in its potential energy
For block \(M_{2}\), the change in its kinetic energy is equal and opposite to the change in its potential energy
For the system of blocks \(M_{1}\) and \(M_{2}\), the change in its kinetic energy is equal and opposite to the change in its potential energy
The total momentum of blocks \(M_{1}\) and \(M_{2}\) remains constant
